response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $800,000, which we believe reflects its true worth while providing you with an excellent opportunity to own it. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss this further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 800000}
